visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color palette. Additional configurations include setting chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and the background color is set to a light gray shade (#f9f9f9). The title of the chart is styled with a dark gray color, bold font weight, and a font size of 20px. The x-axis categories represent the months from January to December, with labels styled in a medium gray color and a font size of 14px. The y-axis is titled 'Temperature (°C)' with labels also styled in medium gray and a font size of 14px. The data series represents monthly temperature data with values ranging from 29.9 to 216.4, and the series is colored with a tomato red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled with medium gray text and a font size of 14px. Additional configurations include setting the top and bottom margins of the chart to 60px and 80px, respectively.
